This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] H.264 SEI recovery point frames are treated as keyframes.
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "DataError: Failed to execute 'decode' on 'VideoDecoder': An EncodedVideoChunk was marked as type `key` but wasn't a key frame. A key frame is required after configure() or flush()."
Harness: the test ran to completion.
